Are you a male or a female or other (Pandora's box of various congenital anomalies)? Let's keep it simple - no gender talk. Just plain sex designation on your birth certificate.

I'm a male and I have a feeling that there aren't any girls on this forum.

Most gamers are male, but I expected to see a more balanced situation for KSP. Why is that? Opinions?

Poll is anonymous.

Edited September 16, 2013 by lajoswinkler

I'm other.

'cause im kerbal.

*epic music*
Is that really important anyway?

If you search this forum you'll find out that its dwellers are incapable of discussing gender without filling pages and pages of sexist comments. Why start one more tread that will need heavy moderation?

Also, your very first post already give the tone of what's to come...

I don't understand... is the noun "sex" a problem? It's not about coitus. We're not discussing gender issues. I'm merely trying to see the overall demographics of KSP forum, that's why I've said "no gender talk".

Also I have zero experience with sexist remarks on this forum. In fact, this seems like a nice place.

Important or not, I'm interested. Most new threads are repetitive or boring. Why should this one be a problem?
It is a nice place and no the word "sex" is not the problem. But no matter what anyone posts here someone will get offended.

Whatever you do in life, someone gets offended. There are stupid people out there that would be offended by your existence and breathing. Just ignore it. If someone starts making trouble, report the post and carry on.

(40% of "other"... if users aren't deliberately destroying the poll, KSP forum is anomalous )
Believe me its not that easy here.
Guys, LajoSwinker is asking a question. If you don't want to contribute to the thread that's fine but please don't derail it.
I dont know but i think that the poll is ruined anyway :/

I apologize, I'd probably sounded bitter and judgmental. I'm not offended by your post, it's a valid poll after all, but by your very wording in your fist post you know in what these treads usually end up.

By all means you can have your tread, after all it is what keeps a forum alive.

To answer some of your questions: Yes there are women in this forum, some of them make great youtube videos as well.

It's ok.

Damn my political correctness. I shouldn't have put "other" in the poll. But at least now we have additional evidence that correlates with my earlier poll about the user ages.

Can someone link those youtube videos made by females?

Damn my political correctness. I shouldn't have put "other" in the poll.

On the contrary, I applaud your recognising that not everyone fits neatly into one box or the other. As a suggestion, perhaps edit the OP to make it clear that it is an anonymous poll. I'm sure there is a female presence on the forums, but they may be wary of outing themselves as such.
I am a space alien. We are genderless.
I love how out of 2 pages, only 2 post are answers to the question. *Slow clap for the internet*

This thread comes across as pretty rude. Also you "can" change your birth certificate.

Anyhoo, I'm female, 19. Found my way here through a funny chain of events. My boyfriend got me into Skyrim early last year. From there I found Robbaz on Youtube, who does funny Skyrim videos. And one day I saw he had some videos on KSP. SO I downloaded the demo and it was awesome! And so here I am.

And I voted "other", just to mess with the results.
